solution_line_template: Tedra harvests {fraction_half} * {wednesday_harvest} kg = <<{fraction_half}*{wednesday_harvest}={thursday_harvest}>>{thursday_harvest} kg of tomatoes on Thursday.

Tedra harvests {total_harvest} kg - {wednesday_harvest} kg - {thursday_harvest} kg = <<{total_harvest}-{wednesday_harvest}-{thursday_harvest}={friday_harvest}>>{friday_harvest} kg of tomatoes on Friday.

After giving away tomatoes to his friends, he is left with {friday_harvest} kg - {given_away_tomatoes} kg = <<{friday_harvest}-{given_away_tomatoes}={remaining_tomatoes}>>{remaining_tomatoes} kg of tomatoes.
